name: RegistryValue
description: Creates a registry value under a registry key.

Id.description: Unique identifier for this registry value.

Root.description: The registry hive. Inherited from parent RegistryKey if not specified.

Key.description: The path to the registry key. Inherited from parent RegistryKey if not specified.

Name.description: Name of the value. Leave empty for the default value.

KeyPath.description: If yes, this registry value is the key path for its component.

examples.code: <RegistryValue Root="HKLM" Key="Software\MyApp" Name="InstallPath" Value="[INSTALLFOLDER]" Type="string" KeyPath="yes" />
